Lucy Gets Ricky on the Radio
Item.Description: When "Lucy Gets Ricky on the Radio" was edited for reruns, footage of Freddy Fillmore holding up a post for sponsor Philip Morris was replaced by close-ups of Lucy, filmed by another camera. Here is the scene from the syndicated version, followed by a "side by side" comparison.

Item.Title: Fancy Editing: Lucy Does a TV Commercial
Item.Description: For reruns, part of this scene from "Lucy Does a TV Commercial" (in which Lucy plugs sponsor Philip Morris) was deleted and replaced by an alternate camera shot and slightly altered audio. Here are two versions of the scene.
